tweet: China appreciates Prime Minister Imran Khan and the Pakistani government for the great importance they attach to China-Pakistan industrial cooperation and the active efforts they have made in this regard.

name: Lijian Zhao 赵立坚
tweet: Almost 30 years after signing, the US has yet to ratify the Convention on Biodiversity or announce plans to ratify it. We hope the US can bear in mind the wellbeing of the world’s people and take concrete actions to win the trust of the international community.  https://t.co/y5vKnKJGUU

name: Lijian Zhao 赵立坚
tweet: Ex-Pentagon software chief Chaillan plans to testify to Congress about Chinese cyber threat to US supremacy. We oppose cyber attack in all its forms, slanders against China, the pursuit of supremacy&wanton act to smear others and fool the people in the name of cyber security.

name: Lijian Zhao 赵立坚
tweet: We urge India to respect our major concerns, stop acting in a way that complicates&expands the boundary issue, refrain from undermining mutual trust&bilateral relations, maintain peace&stability in the border area and work for sound&steady development of the relations.

name: Lijian Zhao 赵立坚
tweet: China's position on the China-India boundary issue is consistent and clear-cut. The Chinese gov has never recognized the so-called “Arunachal Pradesh” established unilaterally and illegally by the Indian side and firmly opposes the Indian leader’s visit to the area concerned.  https://t.co/ufrIdSivcD

name: Lijian Zhao 赵立坚
tweet: China highly appreciates FM Lavrov’s statement that “Russia considers Taiwan to be part of the PRC. We have proceeded and will proceed from this premise in our foreign policy”.  https://t.co/5tFiyFGA0d

name: Lijian Zhao 赵立坚
tweet: China welcomes the smooth formation of the new State Duma of Russia, and will deepen cooperation between the legislatures and substantiate the China-Russia comprehensive strategic partnership of coordination for a new era.

name: Lijian Zhao 赵立坚
tweet: Almost 30 years after signing, the US has yet to ratify the Convention on Biodiversity or announce plans to ratify it. We hope the US can bear in mind the wellbeing of the world’s people and take concrete actions to win the trust of the international community.  https://t.co/y5vKnKJGUU

name: Lijian Zhao 赵立坚
tweet: Ex-Pentagon software chief Chaillan plans to testify to Congress about Chinese cyber threat to US supremacy. We oppose cyber attack in all its forms, slanders against China, the pursuit of supremacy&wanton act to smear others and fool the people in the name of cyber security.

name: Lijian Zhao 赵立坚
tweet: We urge India to respect our major concerns, stop acting in a way that complicates&expands the boundary issue, refrain from undermining mutual trust&bilateral relations, maintain peace&stability in the border area and work for sound&steady development of the relations.

name: Lijian Zhao 赵立坚
tweet: China's position on the China-India boundary issue is consistent and clear-cut. The Chinese gov has never recognized the so-called “Arunachal Pradesh” established unilaterally and illegally by the Indian side and firmly opposes the Indian leader’s visit to the area concerned.  https://t.co/ufrIdSivcD

name: Lijian Zhao 赵立坚
